title: Homepage - U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA)
description: Energy Information Administration - EIA - Official Energy Statistics from the U.S. Government
cleaned_text: Hybrid, plug-in hybrid, and battery-electric vehicle sales in the United States have increased in recent years as sales have decreased for non-hybrid gasoline- or diesel-fueled vehicles. In the second quarter of 2023 (2Q23), hybrid, plug-in hybrid, and battery-electric vehicles collectively accounted for 16% of light-duty vehicle sales in the United States, according to data from Wards Intelligence. [More ](/todayinenergy/detail.php?id=60321) Data source: Wards Intelligence 9/7/2023: $86.87/barrel up$4.93 year earlier 9/7/2023: $2.579/MMBtu down$0.189 from week earlier down$5.263 from year earlier 9/2/2023: 11.767 million tons down0.096 million tons from week earlier down1.021 million tons from year earlier 9/1/2023: 3,148 Bcf up33 earlier 9/1/2023: 416.6 million barrels down6.3 million barrels from week earlier down10.6 million barrels from year earlier
